summary: The module provides Qt widgets that embed Matplotlib figures, including specialized canvases and navigation toolbars for linear, side, and top view visualisations of flight tracks and related data. It manages figure creation, axis configuration, image and legend rendering, interactive pan/zoom, configuration persistence, and figure saving.
business_intent: Supply reusable, interactive plotting components for the MSS application so users can explore and analyse flight and atmospheric data within a Qt graphical interface.
